segment.source: AppLocker deployment guide (Windows 10)
segment.target: AppLocker deployment guide (Windows 10)

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals introduces the concepts and describes the steps required to deploy AppLocker policies.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals introduces the concepts and describes the steps required to deploy AppLocker policies.

segment.source: AppLocker deployment guide
segment.target: AppLocker deployment guide

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals introduces the concepts and describes the steps required to deploy AppLocker policies.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals introduces the concepts and describes the steps required to deploy AppLocker policies.

segment.source: This guide provides steps based on your design and planning investigation for deploying application control policies by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This guide provides steps based on your design and planning investigation for deploying application control policies by using AppLocker.

segment.source: It is intended for security architects, security administrators, and system administrators.
segment.target: It is intended for security architects, security administrators, and system administrators.

segment.source: Through a sequential and iterative deployment process, you can create application control policies, test and adjust the policies, and implement a method for maintaining those policies as the needs in your organization change.
segment.target: Through a sequential and iterative deployment process, you can create application control policies, test and adjust the policies, and implement a method for maintaining those policies as the needs in your organization change.

segment.source: This guide covers the use of Software Restriction Policies (SRP) in conjunction with AppLocker policies to control application usage.
segment.target: This guide covers the use of Software Restriction Policies (SRP) in conjunction with AppLocker policies to control application usage.

segment.source: For a comparison of SRP and AppLocker, see Using Software Restriction Policies and AppLocker policies in this guide.
segment.target: For a comparison of SRP and AppLocker, see Using Software Restriction Policies and AppLocker policies in this guide.

segment.source: To understand if AppLocker is the correct application control solution for you, see Understand AppLocker policy design decisions.
segment.target: To understand if AppLocker is the correct application control solution for you, see Understand AppLocker policy design decisions.

segment.source: Contents of this guide
segment.target: Contents of this guide

segment.source: This guide provides steps based on your design and planning investigation for deploying application control policies created and maintained by AppLocker for computers running any of the supported versions of Windows listed in Requirements to use AppLocker.
segment.target: This guide provides steps based on your design and planning investigation for deploying application control policies created and maintained by AppLocker for computers running any of the supported versions of Windows listed in Requirements to use AppLocker.

segment.target: Understand the AppLocker policy deployment process

segment.target: This planning and deployment topic for the IT professional describes the process for using AppLocker when deploying application control policies.

segment.target: Use Software Restriction Policies and AppLocker policies
